title: cmd/gc: lost many comments during c2go translation
body:
Many comments have been lost. For example, compare the Node type just prior to merge:

https://github.com/golang/go/blob/bceb18e4989aee4971fa1de6bb9f5ba7410d5219/src/cmd/gc/go.h#L247

After merge:

https://github.com/golang/go/blob/master/src/cmd/internal/gc/go.go#L148


It's not just types. For example, there are missing const/enum comments in swt.go:

Before: https://github.com/golang/go/blob/bceb18e4989aee4971fa1de6bb9f5ba7410d5219/src/cmd/gc/swt.c#L16

After: https://github.com/golang/go/blob/master/src/cmd/internal/gc/swt.go#L17

@rsc
